attributes.background: we want them cancelled because the students have struggled a lot especially in lockdown. We think being back in school is just putting lots of pressure on the students. If they are cancelled they can do better in the future especially without the pressure being put on them for revising for GCSE’s.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
